name: Blazing Beaks
description: Roguelite where too much greediness can lead to death. Colorful world with armed birds blazing the way out through the piles of mutants, monsters and creepy creatures. Lots of mysteries to unravel, secrets to find and levels to explore.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, or 10 Processor: 2+ GHz Dual-Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
